Key Match Events: Portland Trail Blazers struggled with 3-point shooting, shooting 9-of-32 (28%)
Shaedon Sharpe made his season debut and scored 13 points
Blazers held Victor Wembanyama to 12 points, 8 rebounds, 4 steals, and 3 blocks
Post-Match Reflections: Blazers coach Chauncey Billups stated the team was 'chasing our tails' and praised the defense on Victor Wembanyama
